name: Agathonas Iakovidis
description: '''Agathonas Iakovidis''' ({{langx|el|Αγάθωνας Ιακωβίδης}}; 2 January 1955 – 5 August 2020) was a [[Greeks|Greek]] [[folk singer]] of [[rebetiko]] style. He [[Greece in the Eurovision Song Contest 2013|represented Greece]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2013]] with [[Koza Mostra]] and the song "[[Alcohol Is Free]]".
